#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t, n, i, a[100000], x;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		sort(a,a+n);
		x=n;
		if(n%2==0)
		n--;
		for(i=1;i<n;i+=2)
		swap(a[i],a[i+1]);
        for(i=0;i<x;i++)
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
